deauthorize(address).details: Privileged function to de authorize an address

params.who: The address to remove authorization from

params._target: The target address where the call will be performed.

isAuthorized(address).details: Returns true if an address is authorized

returns._0: true if authorized false if not

params._amount: The amount of ETH or ERC20 to send.
params._token: Either (1) An ERC20 token address or (2) the _ETH_CONSTANT to use transfer ETH.

approve(address,address,uint256).notice: Sets an ERC20 allowance from this contract to a _spender.

genericCall(address,bytes).notice: Performs a generic call from this contract.

sendFunds(address,uint256,address).notice: Sends funds from the treasury to an address.
